spell id [id]: 42

number of effects [nreff]: 1
Paralyze:5
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The necromancer hurls a blast of dark energies against his enemies. The blast ignores all armor and can paralyze those wounded by the spell. The undead are immune to this spell.
